package.name: Interakt_App
package.summary: Interakt will simplify customer data analysis, marketing and support. It is an integrated crm that lets you do email marketing, engage customers through live chat, retain and support your customers, all from one single dashboard.
package.description: With Interakt you can capture new leads directly from your magento application, connect with the existing users via email & push notifications and answer them through chat & helpdesk. Capture Leads in every possible way. Import existing leads, divide them in segments and nurture them in realtime. Capture user sessions, activities & dynamics with rich profiling for every user. Create segments and track their progress. Customize templates to send automated marketing & transactional emails. Engage users and view email stats. Installing Interakt Extension on Magento 1. Click the “Install Now” button at the top of the page. 2. Copy the key provided. 3. Login to your Magento connect manager, paste key and click to install. 4. Click the Systems Tab to populate the drop down menu Select Cofiguration. 5. Click on the InteraktApp tab, paste app key and app id which you can get from your Interakt.co account. 6. Click on sync user button to sync your customer data to Interakt.
package.notes: In case of any bugg found, please contact support@interakt.co
